products.name: Abstract Canvas Painting
products.description: Acrylic on stretched canvas, vibrant colors,Hand-painted abstract artwork on high-quality canvas using acrylic or oil paints. Customizable for wall dimensions.

products.name: Cross-Stitched Wall Hanging
products.description: A beautifully handcrafted wall decor piece, featuring intricate cross-stitch designs. These wall hangings are created with premium cotton fabric and framed in wooden or metal borders, making them durable and visually appealing. Perfect for adding a touch of elegance and charm to any space.

products.name: Crochet Plush Toys
products.description: Adorable, handmade crochet plush toys crafted with soft, skin-friendly yarn, perfect for kids and collectors. These toys are durable, safe, and filled with hypoallergenic stuffing, making them suitable for all ages.

products.name: Clay Miniature Sculptures
products.description: Delicately handcrafted clay miniature sculptures, perfect for collectors and decor enthusiasts. These intricate pieces are made with high-quality polymer clay, ensuring durability and vibrant details.

products.name: Wooden Carvings
products.description: Exquisitely handcrafted wooden carvings made from high-quality natural wood, showcasing intricate details and artistic craftsmanship. Perfect for adding a rustic charm to any space.

products.name: Resin Art Wall Clock
products.description: A stunning handmade wall clock featuring vibrant resin art designs that combine functionality with artistic elegance. Each piece is crafted with precision and sealed for a glossy, durable finish.

products.name: Clay Planters
products.description: Charming handmade clay planters designed to bring a natural and artistic touch to your indoor or outdoor spaces. Each piece is crafted with care, ensuring durability and unique aesthetics.

products.name: Handmade Wooden Jewelry Box
products.description: A beautifully crafted wooden jewelry box, combining elegance and functionality. Perfect for organizing and storing your precious accessories, these boxes are designed with intricate details and a smooth finish.

products.name: Quilling Art Frames
products.description: Delicate and intricate quilling art framed in beautiful designs, made by hand from paper strips. These framed artworks add a touch of elegance and creativity to any room.

products.name: Handwoven Wall Hangings
products.description: Elegant and unique handwoven wall hangings crafted with natural fibers, adding texture and warmth to any space. These pieces are made with traditional weaving techniques, creating a blend of art and function.

products.name: Stained Glass Panels
products.description: Beautifully crafted stained glass panels that blend vibrant colors and intricate designs, perfect for adding a touch of elegance and color to any space. Each panel is hand-cut and assembled with care, creating a timeless piece of art.

products.name: Handmade Soaps
products.description: Luxurious and natural handmade soaps crafted with high-quality ingredients, designed to cleanse and nourish the skin. These soaps are made using traditional methods, ensuring a gentle yet effective wash.

products.name: Body Scrub
products.description: A luxurious handmade body scrub that gently exfoliates and hydrates the skin, leaving it soft, smooth, and glowing. Made with natural exfoliants and nourishing oils for an effective skincare routine.

products.name: Lip Balm
products.description: A nourishing and hydrating handmade lip balm that softens and protects your lips, keeping them smooth and moisturized throughout the day. Made with natural ingredients to ensure safe and gentle care.

products.name: Hair Mask
products.description: A deeply moisturizing and nourishing handmade hair mask that restores and strengthens your hair, leaving it soft, shiny, and healthy. Made with natural ingredients to rejuvenate all hair types.

products.name: Scented Candles
products.description: Hand-poured scented candles that fill your space with calming and refreshing aromas, perfect for relaxation or creating a cozy ambiance. Made with natural soy wax for a clean, long-lasting burn.

products.name: Essential Oil Blend
products.description: A soothing and invigorating handmade essential oil blend designed to promote relaxation, energy, or focus. Made with 100% pure and natural essential oils, carefully selected for their therapeutic properties.

products.name: Bath Bomb
products.description: A fizzy, luxurious bath bomb that dissolves in water, releasing soothing scents, moisturizing oils, and vibrant colors to enhance your bath experience. Perfect for relaxation and skin nourishment.

products.name: Face Serums
products.description: A nourishing and rejuvenating handmade face serum designed to target specific skin concerns such as hydration, anti-aging, or brightening. Made with high-quality natural oils and botanical extracts for a healthy, glowing complexion.

products.name: Natural Tinted Lip Balms
products.description: A nourishing and colorful natural lip balm that provides hydration while adding a subtle tint to your lips. Made with organic ingredients to keep your lips soft, smooth, and protected.

products.name: Solid Perfumes
products.description: A convenient and eco-friendly way to carry your favorite fragrance in a solid form. Handmade with natural oils and waxes, these solid perfumes provide a subtle, long-lasting scent that’s perfect for on-the-go.

products.name: Handmade Roll-On Perfumes
products.description: A natural and convenient way to wear fragrance, these handmade roll-on perfumes are infused with essential oils and natural ingredients. The roll-on applicator ensures a smooth, precise application with a long-lasting scent.
